transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan, theek hai sir. Bolo.
Executive: Hmm, kya ho raha hai sir?
Customer: Aaj, aaj kal payment ho jayegi aaj ki nahi hogi?
Executive: Hogi, hogi, hogi. Hogi.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Ho jayegi, ho jayegi. Are, late tak ho jayega. Aaj bhi ho jayega, kal bhi ho jayega.
Customer: Achha, aaj bhi ho jayega, kal bhi ho jayega payment sir. To sir, aaj dekhna ki sir pura, pura payment ek baar kar dete na to thoda sa sir, aap hi sochiye ki main daily-daily sir, main mere ko bhej rahe hain, uske liye sir mujhe mail karna padta hai, sara cheeze ko karna padta hai. To agar possible hai to ek hi baar aap 60,000 kar do sir.
Executive: Payment to aa hi rahi hai. Aap kitna bacha hai?
Customer: Jaise aa raha hai, ek-ek kar raha hoon.
Executive: Jaise aa raha hai, ek minute mein kar raha hoon main.
Customer: Haan, haan, mujhe pata hai sir ki aapke paas aata hai to aap payment kar dete hain. Mujhe pata hai is cheez ko iske liye main nahi bol raha hoon. But yahi hai ki sir aapne bola na ki aaj aur kal mein main pura final kar dunga. To aaj aur kal, matlab 24, 24 hours mein aap bol rahe hain ki full payment kar dunga. To aaj hi aap dekh lo sir, koshish kar lo aur shaam ko sir ek hi baar 60,949 rupees aapka pending hai.
Executive: Payment aa rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi, kyunki main sara aapko paisa bhi bata raha hoon to sir itna paisa aapka hai. To koi, mere ko koi dikkat nahi sir aap to payment kar hi rahe hain na. Sir ko aap nahi karte to ek mere ko lagta hai na ki haan. Thoda sa ye hai ki jitna bhi paisa risk hai, uske according agar company ke according sir, hum bhi yahan pe employee hain sir.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi, aap employee ho. Market ki bahut buri condition hai.
Customer: Bahut buri condition.
Executive: I know market ki condition dekho sir aap aapki line mein ho na, wo cash hi hota hai. Mujhe bhi pata hai ki aapki line mein kis tarah cash hota hai.
Customer: Alag hi hamare ko dekho, hamare ko daily, daily, suno meri baat suno. Hamare to daily dukandari hai hi nahi.
Executive: Hai ki nahi?
Customer: Haan. Haan. Haan.
Executive: Hamari dukandari to daily, daily hai hi nahi.
Customer: Pata hai sir dukandari ki.
Executive: Jin ke paas, aur jin ke paas daily basis ki dukandari hai na, wo bhi ro rahe hain is baar.
Customer: Sir dekho ro, ro rahe hain usse dekho ki market ke andar kabhi up, kabhi down chalte rahega. Ye to sir aap bhi, aapko bhi pata hai sir ki 12 mahine mein, 12 mahina market boom nahi rehta hai. Aap share market mein dekh lo, stock market mein dekh lo, har mahine ek jaisa nahi hota hai. Kabhi up, kabhi down hote rehta hai. Lekin aisa nahi hai na sir ki aapko puri saal business nahi mila. To ye sari cheeze kabhi dekho sir, aaj ki date mein kisi ke paas paisa nahi hota hai. Paise ko ghumane ki jarurat hoti hai. Paise, paise se paise banta hai sir. Aapko bhi pata hai ki paise se hi paisa banta hai. Paisa kaise aapko manage karna hai wo to sir aap behtar jante ho mere se sir. Main to just like ek employee hoon aur main jo company ke according main work karta hoon, wahi aapko inform bhi karta hoon ki sir aise hai, aise hai sir. Agar aap daily basis pe 10,000, 20,000 kar rahe ho, theek hai main maan raha hoon. Aap kar rahe ho main, main usko wo karta hoon. Lekin sir aap hi socho ki aage bhi dena hai ek aur aapka hai 1,10,000 ka payment pending bacha hua hai. To wo bhi aapko karna hai. To isliye aap jitna jaldi ye kar dete hain, aap fir aap fir 15 din, 20 din baith jate hain, aap business nahi nikalte, fir aap wahan pe nikalte hain. To main aapki bhalai ke liye hi kar raha hoon. Aisa nahi hai sir ki dekho ye to sir aapko maine guide kar raha hoon ki kaise manage karna hai, kya karna hai. Baki aap to behtar jante hi hain sir.
Executive: Matlab.
Customer: Nahi, wo to sir dekho aap experience hain aap kafi.
Executive: Log isko kama ke, kuch apne ko kama ke log nahi karte hain, paise banane ka nahi lagate hain.
Customer: Hamara rules hai.
Executive: Sir haan aapka rules hai. Aap sahi bol rahe ho ki aapka rules.
Customer: Hum aaj main, har cheez, main, main har cheez aapki baat ko samajhta hoon aur market mein jo jahan pe ho us, main maan raha hoon us cheez ko hai. Lekin sir jo ab khana insan chhod nahi sakta hai na sir, chahe kitna bhi aapda ho ghar mein ya kuch bhi problems ho, to insan khana to band nahi karta hai na sir. Agar khana band kar dega to fir wo khayega kya matlab kamayega kya. Jab kamayega nahi to fir ghar mein aapko jaane ki kitne sare kharche hote hain to wo maintain kaise karega. To wo sari cheeze sir jo jaruri hai usko to karna hi hai na.
Executive: Hamare yahan bhi wale ke aisa hai, suno meri baat. Kal bhi hamare pados mein maut ho gayi.
Customer: Maut ho gayi.
Executive: Sir aapke, aapke pados mein, nahi, nahi, nahi, aapke pados mein maut hogi ki aapke family mein hai na koi sir?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, family mein to paanch din pehle hui thi. Suno meri baat ko suno. Aaj mere dost, aaj main, wahan bhi jaa, abhi jaake abhi khana hai, just khana khaya hai maine. Abhi ghar mein. Achha, achha, achha. Aise, aise, aise logon ko jaate hain, aise, nahi, ek program mein jaate hain to kisi se baat bhi nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Achha, achha.
Executive: Aise koi nahi sir main aapki baat ko samajhta hoon sir.
Customer: Aap lekin sir paisa aaj, aaj mujhe aap kitna aaj karenge ki nahi karenge aur karenge to kitna karenge ye thoda sa mujhe bata sakte hain aap?
Executive: Sir 2,000 se aayega, kaat, kitna aata hai main aapko bata nahi sakta. Ek andaz, ek scenario.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: 30-40,000 aa rahe hain. Ab dekho kitna aata hai. Aane ko to 30-40,000 aane ka hai par ab kitna aata hai wo main nahi bata sakta hoon aapko.
Customer: Achha, 30-40,000 aane ka hai.
Executive: 30 nahi 40 aane ka hai mere ko. Par ab aane ke baad pata chalega.
Customer: Achha, 40 aane ko hai.
Executive: Par aapko, mere paas aayega. Wahi 6-7,000 tak, 6 baje tak sir na.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Aur main apne mam ko update kar deta hoon. Theek hai? Lekin wahi hai sir aap kara dena bas aur kya isme bol sakta hoon.
Executive: Karwa dunga, karwa dunga.
Customer: Chalo. Chalo, dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to make full payment at once.

Resolution:

- Executive explained the process and importance of payment.
- Executive assured payment will be done today/tomorrow.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to make payment.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, pending amount, business
